DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Angioshield device safely applied support saphenous vein graft use standard coronary bypass surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Angioshield First-In-Human Study Demonstrate Preliminary Safety Efficacy
DOC.detailed_description: \This first human study intend determine large pivotal study justify .
DOC.criteria: Subject eligible inclusion investigation he/she : age 18 80 year age , inclusive require Coronary Atery Bypass Graft ( CABG ) surgery minimum one SVG use bypass stenosis Right Coronary , Circumflex , Diagonal , Obtuse Marginal artery , due atherosclerotic coronary artery disease able give inform write consent willing able complete followup visit procedure Subject exclude participation investigation he/she : currently enrol another clinical investigation unable tolerate comply require postsurgical medication image ( e.g. , anticoagulation regimen ; know allergy contrast agent ) may pregnant lactating , plan become pregnant next 12 month show presence hypercoagulable state history idiopathic venous arterial thrombosis acute MI within last 21 day previous CABG require emergency surgery leave ejection fraction ( LEF ) less 20 % target vessel stenosis le 70 % transmural infarct target artery territory currently require dialysis concomitantsurgery kind varicose vein previous saphenectomy
